column3: [' (StepDescription: Remove-Remove the noodles from the package(Break Noodles / Keep them as a block))']
[' (StepDescription: Chop-Chop 1 garlic clove on a cutting board)']
[' (StepDescription: Put-Put all the Vegetables in a microwave-safe bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add the noodles to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Cover-Cover with a lid (or paper towel) to prevent splattering)']
[' (StepDescription: Let-Let the noodles sit for about 1 minute after the microwave stops)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add chopped cilantro to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Mix-Mix in the flavour packet to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Stir-Stir noodles with a spoon or fork until the flavouring dissolves)']
